rows.label: qst200718_msg0001
rows.name:
Round one of first Mushroom
Speedy-Eaty contest begin soon!
Challengers welcome!

rows.label: qst200718_msg0002
rows.name:
Ooh, I wanted to join this!
You get a lot of mushrooms to eat!

rows.label: qst200718_msg0005
rows.name:
But it would be no contest with
only one contestant...

rows.label: qst200718_msg0006
rows.name:
N-no! How awful!
So I can't eat a lot of mushrooms?!

rows.label: qst200718_msg0007
rows.name:
Okay, in that case,
Tora pick up gauntlet.
Now can have contest, yes?

rows.label: qst200718_msg0008
rows.name:
Wonderful! Then long-awaited first
round of Mushroom Speedy-Eaty
contest begin imminently!

rows.label: qst200718_msg0010
rows.name:
Tora should warn Idaten,
Tora not go easy!

rows.label: qst200718_msg0011
rows.name: I'll do my best too, count on it!
